summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4517 for the improvement of 9th Avenue Northeast, from East 75th Street to north line of block 9, Garder J. Gwinn's Addition, by paving, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52941, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
